channel.title: Hey guys me again!I really need help!
channel.description: Hey guys, u might of helped me in the past wid the npcs and the shops cfg thing, but now i need help with the npc drops! All i need to know is how do u make for example "white knights" drop white rarely? PLease help me, i would appreciate it very much!

item.title: Hey guys me again!I really need help!
item.dc:creator: @1_vitiello_1 1 vitiello 1
item.description:
@1_vitiello_1 wrote:

i dont have a drop list or npcdrop.cfg, could u give me 1?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2008, 05:00:54 PM[/size][hr]hello?

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys me again!I really need help!

item.title: Hey guys me again!I really need help!
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Theres quite a few different techniques for item dropping. wL actually has a chance of each item being dropped. Other servers just randomly choose an item in the npcdrops.cfg or your servers drop list. Just open the drop list, analyse and npc drop that is already in there and then adapt it for your npc.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys me again!I really need help!
